# Count_Satellites_Tool

<img align='left' src="https://camo.githubusercontent." height='100'/> The tool detects and counts the neurons and the neurons with satellite cells. <br><br><br><br><hr>

See the [tool's wiki page](https://github.com/MontpellierRessourcesImagerie/imagej_macros_and_scripts/wiki/Count_Satellites_Tool) for more information.
